name: Night Plaza
description: The surrounding environment will have buildings with neon signs in the city at night. The world will have an Asian aesthetic with rain and city trash scattered around. The theme of this environment is an Asian hate crime in the future. There will be gunshot sounds in the background and weapons in the foreground as a crime scene. The environment in which the audience can roam around it will be a plaza-like area in the middle of the city with a laundromat, a noodle bar, an arcade, and a boarded-up cafe with a crime scene inside. The laundromat, noodle bar, and arcade can be entered while the cafe cannot. There will be doors and windows to peek into around the plaza too.
